name: Patrician
description:
This release is highly incomplete. Here is a list of the things you can do in the game:

  • Cycle through music tracks on the title screen (select the Music menu button and press A)
  • Travel around the galaxy. Use left and right to turn and up to move forward.
  • Press Select during the game to change your ship.
  • You can run into random encounters, but combat functionality is not implemented. Use up and down to move your ship, left and right to switch between looking at your own ship and your enemy's ship, and press A to end the encounter.

Future updates for this game, to bring it to more of a playable state, are planned.

Music, sound effects and art are by one60hp. Code is by Mahou Shoujo Magical Moestar.

Code is available under the MIT License. Graphics and music are available under CC-BY-SA. https://github.com/DrLancer-X/patrician
